mapper.select: SELECT ami.group_id, ami.hos_id, ami.copy_code, ami.acc_year, ami.proj_id, ami.proj_no, ami.bal_os, ami.sum_od, ami.sum_oc, ami.end_os, hpd.proj_code, hpd.proj_name FROM ACC_MATCH_INIT ami left join HOS_PROJ_DICT hpd on ami.group_id = hpd.group_id and ami.hos_id = hpd.hos_id and ami.proj_id = hpd.proj_id and hpd.is_stop = 0 WHERE ami.group_id = #{group_id} and ami.hos_id = #{hos_id} and ami.copy_code = #{copy_code} and ami.acc_year = #{acc_year} and ami.proj_id = #{proj_id}
